content.rendered:
Tempulli does not yet provide student housing. However, when constructing the new Campus, in consultation with engineers and architects, the construction of student accommodation spaces will also be planned.

On the occasion of celebrating the 30th anniversary of Tempulli, the first phase of new Innovation Campus shall be inaugurated.

The location for building the Campus is in the new part of the city, which has access into wider roads of Pristina, street B and C. The Urban program has been approved.

Project – Technical description
